ores-damaging-filter:
Label to toggle filtering on ORES data. Parameters:
* $1 - Action to be performed by toggling. Can be either 'show' or 'hide'.
ores-damaging-hard:
Name of "Hard" threshold

Basically, when you set a threshold too hard, you give it a high number, so less edits will be flagged for review but the chance of them being vandalism is higher. On the other hand, when you set it too soft, it flags more edits. So you might catch all vandalism, but proportion of vandalism would be less, and you see more false positives (edits that are flagged for review but are completely okay).
ores-damaging-letter: Single letter for tagging possibly damaging recent changes.
ores-damaging-soft:
Name of "Soft" threshold

Basically, when you set a threshold too hard, you give it a high number, so less edits will be flagged for review but the chance of them being vandalism is higher. On the other hand, when you set it too soft, it flags more edits. So you might catch all vandalism, but proportion of vandalism would be less, and you see more false positives (edits that are flagged for review but they are completely okay).
prefs-ores:
{{optional}} 
Name of ORES section in preferences
